version_description: Minor UI fix.

The version upgrade covers the following changes:-
1. Introducing Multiple Passenger Check-in.
2. Improved Destination Guide flow
3. Improved infant flow during booking
4. Other minor fixes

The version upgrade covers exciting new features:

1.New ‘’See Bookings’’ tab in Menu which will allow you to Retrieve/view your desktop Itinerary on App, send itinerary on email, store your last 5 hold & confirmed PNRs
2.Option to pay for
Minor bug fixing.

The version upgrade includes attractive new features:
1. New Home page design with collapsed Menu on top
2. Auto population of ‘Origin’ based on user location on flight booking page
3. Choice of booking below ’Additional Services’ wit
Minor Bug Fixes.

WHAT'S NEW

1. Select you favorite Seat while you make your booking
2. See your Itinerary directly from the Booking Confirmation Screen
3. Addition of ‘Mrs.’ as title for Female traveller
4. Better UI of Booking Confirmation screen
5. Be

1. Improved compatibility with iPhone 6 devices.
2. Minor Bug fixes.

New Features:

1) Login with your IndiGo member profile

2) Make and manage your bookings

3) Store your Itineraries and Boarding Passes

4) Select seats and buy baggage allowance, lounge access, meals and other fun stuff

5
Minor Bug Fixes.

Easy login using mobile number & OTP
Access PNRs booked through any source (website, travel agents, OTAs, airport counter & call center)
Easy access to Add-On Services, Check-In and Flight Status
New wallet options added; PayZapp & Mo

Departure airport terminal and Arrival airport terminal information on itinerary.
Add your booking as events to Phone Calendar.
New form of payments.
Performance enhancement.
GST compliance.

. Guest users can use the App without login

IndiGo has partnered with Turkish Airlines to take you places. With this, you can view both IndiGo as well as Turkish Airlines booking/ itineraries under this single app. Your IndiGo App makes it easier than ever to plan, book, manage all your travel acti

IndiGo has partnered with Turkish Airlines to take you to additional destinations across the globe. You can now book these connecting flights using one reservation using our IndiGo app. So, get going and keep your favourite IndiGo App updated!
